ModMetaData.name: Prepare Moderately
ModMetaData.author: Lakuna
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is intended as a balanced replacement for EdB Prepare Carefully.
Allows the player to set minimum specifications for colonists; colonists that do not meet these specifications are automatically re-rolled. Never again will you have to roll through hundreds of colonists looking for a cannibal-psychopath.
